metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24959 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.16.5. There is amemory leak in yam_siocdevprivate in drivers/net/hamradio/yam.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
